description:
Congresswoman Jasmine Crockett went on The View and did what she does best, which was make up a bunch of nonsense to bash Trump.

Crockett claims the only reason that Trump has a high approval rating is because Americans are too stupid to realize they don't want this. However, it's unclear how she found the nerve to imply that voters are as dumb as her, which they are not.

🚨 COMPLETE COPIUM

The far-left @RepJasmine told @TheView that Trump's approval ratings are at a record-high because Americans are not educated.

70% of Americans say Trump is fulfilling his campaign promises, such as mass deportations, banning m
title: Watch: Rep. Jasmine Crockett claims Americans are too dumb to realize Trump is bad. Yes, THAT Jasmine Crocket

description:
Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass knew of the wildfire risk before the devastating wildfires but decided that was the perfect moment to take a trip to Africa. However, rather than hold any accountability, she has decided to waste more resources “investigating” who is to blame for the trip that no one demanded she go on.

LA Mayor Karen Bass: We're launching investigations to find out why nobody told me that I shouldn't have gone to Africa while my city burned. pic.twitter.com/sdpkSMYPb0
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) February 19, 2025

You
title: LA Mayor is investigating who ALLOWED HER to go to Africa while the city burned. Yes, you read that right...

description:
CNN is flabbergasted, as Trump continues to beat standards the legacy media made up for him. So while the people claim he’s doing exactly what he promised to do, and while he keeps an overall positive approval rating, the media cannot comprehend why the masses refuse to accept their propaganda as Gospel.

CNN’s data reporter Harry Enten reported that “the GOP has changed the electorate,” with the GOP behind him by 84 net approval points, while the Dems are against him by a negative 78 points.

Trump's underwater with indies, but has an overall positive net approval. How?

Trump's broken the mold by remaking the electorate from +6 Dem in 2021 to +2 GOP now!

Moreover, the GOP base is more behind Trump (+84 pt net approval) than the Dem base is agains
title: CNN's flabbergasted not only by Trump's approval rating but that he REALIGNED the political parties

description:
Yesterday, we debunked John Oliver’s incoherent ramblings about Trump and his talent agency, Avalon. We immediately had clips we posted taken down. Predator Poachers Long Island returns with a second chapter from their first catch with a man named Amir. Leftists continue to allege President Trump is a lawless President without noticing he’s using the Barack Obama Executive Order playbook. Trump and Rumble are slated to sue Brazil over continued censorship. Prominent Brazilian journalists Paulo Figueiredo and Allan Dos Santos joined the show. And more!

JOHN OLIVER IS A PUSSY
title: Sources: Fight! Major Lawsuit Announcement...

description:
Europe is a silly place full of silly people, where they don't have things like First OR Second Amendment. And I know what some of you are thinking. "Hey, Brodigan, how do they defend themselves if they don't have a right to bear arms? Knives."

You'd think so, but no. The bad guys have knives since guns are banned, but it is frowned upon for law-abiding citizens to have an everyday carry. Unless, of course, that everyday carry is a towel, as illustrated in this video.

In Germany they teach you to defend yourself from a man with a knife with a towel. It seems like a joke but it's not. pic.twitter.com/eXOdar0TCN
— RadioGenoa (@RadioGenoa)
title: Here's the latest technique to prevent being stabbed in Germany, protect yourself with... a towel?

description:
It's nice to have a president who comes prepared. Not that Joe Biden wasn't prepared before press conferences, but he was given the question beforehand. Donald Trump anticipates what journalismers will ask him and brings data. During a press conference, the president knew he would be asked about DOGE and Cousin Elon, and not in a way that said, "What good work are they doing?" So, Trump made sure he had the numbers.

Not that all of Trump's answers yesterday were great. I know we're supposed to just go "ZOMG BASED" over everything, but that's not what we do here.

I don't love this at all. I'm fine with him being tough on Ukraine, but he needs to be equally tough, if not tougher, on Russia, who after all started the war.

And the claim of 4% approval seems t
title: Smug reporter attempts to question Trump on Elon Musk and DOGE, gets taken down when POTUS whips out the receipts
